landing-hero.desc1: Your resume will be created in seconds
landing-hero.desc2: Create a professional resume quickly and easily, and download for free

how-it-works.title: How it works
how-it-works.step1: Choose a resume template to create a suitable and professional resume.
how-it-works.step3: Download your resume as a PDF file or print it.

ai-suggestions.name: AI Suggestions
ai-suggestions.description: Get optimized skills and sentences in your resume.

easy-editing.name: Easy Editing
easy-editing.description: Add and edit your resume without hassle.

qr-resume.name: QR Code Resume
qr-resume.description: Create a QR code that can be easily scanned.

design.name: Custom Styling
design.description: Change fonts, colors and layout to your preference.

free.title: Free
free.description: Create resumes for free. No credit card required. Great for beginners who want to create a quick and easy resume.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: Create more professional resumes and cover letters, get access to all templates, advanced design features, and AI-assistance.
premium.currStatus: You are already on the premium plan

question-1.question: How can I create a resume on this platform?
question-1.answer: Just sign up, fill in your details and download a ready-made resume.

question-2.question: Can I use this service for free?
question-2.answer: Yes, you can create up to {count} resumes for free and download them in PDF format.

question-3.question: How can I upgrade to the premium version?
question-3.answer: To upgrade to the premium version, select the "Buy It" button and pay.

question-4.question: Can I edit my resume later?
question-4.answer: Yes, you can log in and edit your resume at any time.

question-5.question: What formats can I download my resume in?
question-5.answer: You can download your resume in PDF format or print it.

question-6.question: Are there templates I can choose from?
question-6.answer: Yes, we provide resume templates with different designs that you can choose from and personalize.

question-7.question: Can I use my resume for job applications?
question-7.answer: Yes, our resume templates meet international standards and can be used for job applications.

question-8.question: How can I contact the support team?
question-8.answer: You can write to us on the "Contact Us" page or send an email to our support email address.
